title: iown2BTC
author: iown2BTC
content: Hi!I am new with metaverse. Is it possible to embed website in decentraland/sandbox. When avatar come close to the screen, he/she can see the website live, without exiting the metaverse?Thanks!

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: As far as I know, there is no way to directly embed your website within Decentraland. I believe the current implementation discourages that from happening, so the only thing you can do is to only embed the link to your website. Anyway, I don't think people want to directly see a website on Metaverse, though.For embedding your website link, you can refer to their documentation: Outbound links #External links.
